Consolia

Consolia is my webcomic, it's mostly about programming. I would classify Consolia as technical and weird, with a hint of dumb jokes.

But I also have a passion for simplifying technology to a point anyone can understand. I occasionally write explanation comics where i aim to do exactly this. I'm also working on a book that takes this to the next level. So if you know any publishers, let me know!

Want to contact me?

I'd love to hear from you. Whether it's weird questions, silly remarks, funny insults, or commissions of any of the aforementioned adjectives; all equally loved.

Reach me at tim@consolia-comic.com or use the twitters @timquax.
